Getting Started ​

Import package ​

  • Option 1: Using jsr: specifier with Deno

    js
    import nekos from "jsr:@om/nekos-moe";

  • Option 2: Manually adding package

    Run:

    console
    npx jsr add @om/nekos-moe
    console
    pnpm dlx jsr add @om/nekos-moe
    console
    yarn dlx jsr add @om/nekos-moe
    console
    deno add @om/nekos-moe
    console
    bunx jsr add @om/nekos-moe

    then import the package:

    js
    import nekos from "@om/nekos-moe";

What's next? ​

Check out some usage examples. Alternatively, reference documentation is available at the JSR package site. Please also take a look at the original API documentation.
